text: Al Irfan Secondary School is a secondary and higher secondary school situated in Sulibhanjan village of Khuldabad taluka in Aurangabad district, Maharashtra, India. Al Irfan is a residential school. The school was established in 1998 by the Al Hira society. The school was affiliated with the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) in year 2001. It has English and partial English instruction. == Curriculum == School follows the syllabus and curriculum of the Central Board of Secondary Education. New Delhi. There are three types of classes: English, partial English, and Urdu. Students have two options for curriculum. One is solely English instruction and another is partial English instruction( Urdu-pattern ). Along with this, Arts, Physical Education and Computer education are also provided. http://www.alirfanschool.org ==References== Category:High schools and secondary schools in Maharashtra Category:Educational institutions established in 1998 Category:Education in Aurangabad district, Maharashtra Category:Boarding schools in Maharashtra
title: Al Irfan secondary school
